t: How Joy Mangano, inventor of the Miracle Mop, is growing non-toxic cleaning brand CleanBoss - Modern Retail
s: February 26, 2025 - Mangano, whose early success on QVC inspired the film “Joy” starring Jennifer Lawrence, told Modern Retail that the category was “very different” when she started creating products. Mangano’s non-toxic cleaning brand, CleanBoss, co-founded with fellow cleaning enthusiast and artist Pitbull, is preparing for a major growth year.
